ROW.NAME: 电费收入比对异常企业明细报表

ROW.DATDSC: select name from tax_compclass where id ='[%CORPID]'

SELECT ID 编号,name 企业名称,en 异常差异数据,taxman 税管员 from( select ID,name,eleqty,avgsale,ens,somny,(ens-somny) en,taxman from ( select max(a.YYMM) yymm,b.id,b.name,sum(a.eleqty) eleqty,c.avgsale, round((sum(a.eleqty)/(c.envload))*avgsale,2) ens,sum(d.somny) somny,b.taxman from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_compclass c,tax_taxdata d where a.usrID=b.ammno and b.Typclsid=c.id and b.id=d.id group by b.taxman,b.name,b.id,c.avgsale,c.envload ) a where somny<ens )

select * from ( select '' flag,'[%YYMM1]'||'~'||'[%YYMM2]' YYMM,a.id,a.name,sum(eleqty) eleqty,envload,sum(ens) ens, sum(somny) somny,sum(ens-somny) cz,Ytaxman,taxman from ( select b.id,sum(a.eleqty) eleqty,nvl(round(sum(a.eleqty/c.envload*avgsale),2),0) ens,c.envload, decode(b.Ytaxman,'1','是','否') ytaxman,b.taxman,b.name from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_compclass c where a.usrid=b.ammno and b.Typclsid=c.id --and nvl(b.towns,' ') IN (select name from V_TAX_TOWNS WHERE ID like '[%TOWNS]%') [%GDSSTR] and c.id='[%CORPID]' --and b.stat != '注销' and a.YYMM between '[%YYMM1]' and '[%YYMM2]' group by b.id,b.name,b.Ytaxman,b.taxman,c.envload ) a,(select id,sum(somny) somny from tax_taxdata where YYMM between '[%YYMM1]' and '[%YYMM2]' group by id) d where a.id=d.id group by a.id,a.name,envload,ytaxman,taxman ) where nvl(somny,0) < ens AND nvl(somny,0) between decode('[%STRSALE]','',0,'[%STRSALE]') and decode('[%TOSALE]','',10000000000,'[%TOSALE]') and (id like '%[%CMID]%' or name like '%[%CMID]%')
